data.eml:eml: First two species of Austroleptis Hardy (Diptera: Brachycera: Austroleptidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fachin, Diego Aguilar, Santos, Charles Morphy D., Amorim, Dalton De Souza (2018): First two species of Austroleptis Hardy (Diptera: Brachycera: Austroleptidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4: 557-574, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.4.6
